narrative: Enhanced the FTS Integration Story with richer language and a clearer narrative arc. This update turns the spec from a basic overview into a welcoming roadmap for contributors.
user_input: your story could be enhanced with a little more storytelling skills
purpose: Expand the earlier spec so that newcomers can feel the thematic direction and see how FTS modules will weave into jgtagentic.
future_scene: With this story, future pull requests can reference a guiding vision, making each implementation detail part of a larger tale about the Fractal Trading System.
